meanings.definition: A long, thin piece of material such as thread or cord.
meanings.sent1: She used a stringpiece to sew the buttons back on her shirt.
meanings.sent2: The stringpiece was too short to reach the other side of the fabric.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the stringpiece, thinking it was a toy.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was like a delicate stringpiece, weaving through the melody.
meanings.sent5: The stringpiece glimmered in the sunlight, catching her eye.

meanings.definition: A horizontal piece of wood or stone that forms part of a staircase.
meanings.sent1: Hold onto the stringpiece as you walk up the stairs for support.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter carefully measured and cut the stringpiece for the staircase.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous toddler tried to slide down the stringpiece like a slide.
meanings.sent4: The stringpiece of the staircase creaked under the weight of the heavy furniture.
meanings.sent5: The worn-out stringpiece showed the marks of many footsteps over the years.

meanings.definition: A decorative molding that runs along the top of a wall.
meanings.sent1: The intricate design of the stringpiece added elegance to the room.
meanings.sent2: The painter carefully painted the stringpiece to match the color scheme.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to climb up the stringpiece on the wall.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed off the walls, bouncing off the stringpiece.
meanings.sent5: The stringpiece framed the room like a crown, completing the decor.
